answers.answer: Hi! Yes a macular hole in retina can cause these symptoms, especially headaches. The various causes for a hole in retina are eye injury, retinal detachment, severe myopia or short sightedness, diabetes and shrinkage of vitreous body.  Diabetes can cause tiredness or it can be stress related. Do discuss this with your eye specialist and get yourself examined. Take care!

question: Are dull headaches and tiredness  a symptom or side effect when you have a macular hole.
title: Maqcular Hole
